titleStmt.title: An additional act for the better observation of the Lords-Day, days of thanksgiving and humiliation. Die Veneris, decimo nono Aprilis, 1650. Ordered by the Parliament, that this act be forthwith printed and published. Hen: Scobell, Cleric. Parliamenti.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Edward Husband and Iohn Field, printers to the Parliment of England,

notesStmt.note: On 7G2: the last word of first line of text: 'effectual'; first word of line below initial: 'venting'; the last word of last full line of text: 'and'.
Also issued as part of a through-paged folio set with a table for the entire set added.
Ornament on t.p.; initial letter; text in black letter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
